title: Bella Hadid sizzles in winter sportswear alongside model Salomon Diaz for new Michael Kors campaign
text:
She's hot for winter sports, even taking time off to go skiing when she was in Italy for Men's Fashion Week last year.

Now Bella Hadid is back as the face of Michael Kors' holiday 2019 campaign.

And the 23-year-old showed off her slender figure in a variety of looks as she posed alongside Salomon Diaz.

Ready to hit the slopes: Bella Hadid is the face of Michael Kors' holiday 2019 campaign which is featuring winter wear in yellow, black and white

The designer range is going for bright yellow, black and white this season.

With 'snow' falling during the shoot, the beautiful brunette looked ready for the slopes in a yellow, roll neck sweater with a black and white pattern down both arms.

Stylists teamed it with black leggings, heavy black boots and yellow fingerless gloves,.

Getting a lift: The 23-year-old donned a high-cut, color block swimsuit with a yellow puffer jacket and two padded yellow purses as she clung onto model Salomon Diaz

She carried a Michael Kors snowboard and two yellow purses.

In one shot her long brown hair was smoothed back into a high pony tail with a woolly band around her head and ears and sunglasses perched on top.

Model Salomon also joined Bella, carrying her as she donned a yellow, black and white swimsuit, high-cut to the hip, and definitely not too warm on a winter day.

Design for life: Bella's yellow sweater featured a black and white pattern down both arms

Gazing into the distance: The model adjusted her shades as carried a Michael Kors snowboard under her arm

Having fun: Bella laughed as she tried out a snowboard in January 2018

Fortunately. she tied a yellow puffer jacket tied around her waist to keep her cozy.

Salomen was more warmly dressed in a black top with the word 'ski' in large white letters across the chest, black pants, a black beanie and a huge smile across hie face.

Meanwhile, the ever-in-demand model covered two Vogues in the past week - the Australian edition and the Netherlands copy.

Intense concentration: She skied in Andalo. Italy, in January 2019
description: The 23-year-old showed off her slender figure in a variety of looks for the brandy, which is featurng color blocks of yellow and black with white detailing for the winter season, released on Monday,
